verbs.description: uncultivate (third-person singular simple present uncultivates, present participle uncultivating, simple past and past participle uncultivated)

entries.meaning: (transitive, rare) To undo the cultivation of; to make uncultivated.
examples: To uncultivate is to encourage the transformation from one state to another, just like cultivation, except that it seeks its opposite horizon. It seeks to peel back the layers of cultivation  […]
